50b84450-dc03-4625-bd85-d4d132e081fd.description: Graduates of the SIG University Certified Sourcing Professional (CSP) program have developed the entry-level skills and knowledge needed to effectively communicate in a common sourcing language. They are competent in their knowledge of outsourcing best practices, business and leadership theories, strategic sourcing methodologies and much more.
50b84450-dc03-4625-bd85-d4d132e081fd.name: SIG University - Certified Sourcing Professional (CSP)

badge_template_activities.title: The badge earner has successfully completed all coursework and passed all quizzes in the ten-week Certified Sourcing Professional program.
Course graduates have passing scores on quizzes for each module of the course using their unique login credentials.

The CSP certification is renewable every three years.  A person with the CSP designation has to accumulate 120 Continuing Education Credits through various means of educational opportunities.  SIG offers Continuing Education Credits through in-person and online training. Please check out SIG's current offerings at http://sig.org/

1a7e44df-4c52-45f2-8569-e850ed1bbabd.description: SIG Global Executive Summits are multi-day events that are packed with the latest best practices, cost-cutting strategies, innovative processes and risk-mitigation approaches. A SIG Summit speaker is committed to advancing the industry as a thought leader with deep experience in procurement, sourcing and/or outsourcing. Speakers may be sourcing practitioners from Global 1000 companies, or advisors, consultants or solution providers.
1a7e44df-4c52-45f2-8569-e850ed1bbabd.name: SIG - Global Executive Summit Speaker

badge_template_activities.title: A SIG Global Summit speaker has deep knowledge of procurement, sourcing, supply chain and/or outsourcing trends, strategies and objectives. They are excellent communicators who are able to engage the audience and provide tangible takeaways. They avoid commercialism and concentrate on the steps necessary to build optimized business cases. They are advancing the industry, building knowledge networks and have been qualified to present through a peer-review process.
Join us at the next SIG Global Summit. Click here for more information.
If you are interested in presenting at a SIG event, please reach out to Mary Zampino at mzampino@sig.org or @MaryZampino_SIG.

59053cdd-484e-4e15-b303-4984c7fcda3d.description: Graduates of the SIG University Certified Third Party Risk Management Professional (C3PRMP) program have developed an extensive and tangible working knowledge of and actionable insights into best and emerging practices in third party risk and lifecycle management. They have been provided with the principles of enterprise, operational and third party risk management and learn how to align specific tools and build strong management and monitoring processes.
59053cdd-484e-4e15-b303-4984c7fcda3d.name: SIG University - Certified Third Party Risk Management Professional (C3PRMP)

badge_template_activities.title: The badge earner has successfully completed all coursework  in the eight week Certified Third Party Risk Management Professional (C3PRMP) program.
Course graduates have passing scores on quizzes for each module of the course using their unique login credentials.

The C3PRMP certification is renewable every three years.  A person with the C3PRMP designation has to accumulate 120 Continuing Education Credits through various means of educational opportunities.  SIG offers Continuing Education Credits through in-person and online training. Please check out SIG's current offerings at http://sig.org/

d9a7092c-f406-4658-b534-1fa7d12d3d1a.description: Earners of the SIG University Certified Supplier Management Professional (CSMP) program certification have developed the entry-level skills and knowledge needed to effectively communicate in a common supplier management language. They are competent in knowledge of supplier management outsourcing best practices, business and leadership theories, strategic sourcing methodologies and much more.
d9a7092c-f406-4658-b534-1fa7d12d3d1a.name: SIG University - Certified Supplier Management Professional (CSMP)

badge_template_activities.title: The badge earner has successfully completed all coursework and passed all quizzes in the five week Certified Supplier Management Professional program.
Course graduates have passing scores on quizzes for each module of the course using their unique login credentials.

The CSMP certification is renewable every three years.  A person with the CSMP designation has to accumulate 120 Continuing Education Credits through various means of educational opportunities. SIG offers Continuing Education Credits through in-person and online training. Please check out SIG's current offerings at http://sig.org/

6f19dae6-758b-4f85-b7a2-7563be5c2a0c.description: Graduates of the SIG University Certified Intelligent Automation Professional (CIAP) program have been introduced to automation technologies, learned how to identify the correct opportunities to build, run and sustain a successful automation program, and can understand the true potential of IPA technologies when adopted correctly.
6f19dae6-758b-4f85-b7a2-7563be5c2a0c.name: SIG University - Certified Intelligent Automation Professional (CIAP)

badge_template_activities.title: The badge earner has successfully completed all coursework in the six week Certified Intelligent Automation Professional (CIAP) program.
Program graduates have passing scores on quizzes for each module of the program using their unique login credentials.

The CIAP certification is renewable every three years.  A person with the CIAP designation has to accumulate 120 Continuing Education Credits through various means of educational opportunities.  SIG offers Continuing Education Credits through in-person and online training. Please check out SIG's current offerings at http://sig.org/

28b3593a-872e-4f24-9f52-21a5f3930b6b.description: Graduates of the SIG University Certified Third Party Risk Management Professional (C3PRMP) program have developed an extensive and tangible working knowledge of and actionable insights into best and emerging practices in third party risk and lifecycle management. They have been provided with the principles of enterprise, operational and third party risk management and learn how to align specific tools and build strong management and monitoring processes.
28b3593a-872e-4f24-9f52-21a5f3930b6b.name: SIG University - Certified Third Party Risk Management Professional (C3PRMP) - 66 CPEs

badge_template_activities.title: The badge earner has successfully completed all coursework in the ten week Certified Third Party Risk Management Professional (C3PRMP) program.
Program graduates have passing scores on quizzes for each module of the program using their unique login credentials and have passed a midterm and final exam.

The C3PRMP certification is renewable every three years.  A person with the C3PRMP designation has to accumulate 120 Continuing Education Credits through various means of educational opportunities.  SIG offers Continuing Education Credits through in-person and online training. Please check out SIG's current offerings at http://sig.org/

eff66458-9e78-4860-8882-1586f891c93a.description: SIG University faculty members are forward thinking subject matter experts in sourcing, outsourcing or procurement. They are familiar with "next" practices and can assist students in growing within the profession and share their experiences and expertise with our SIG University students to aide in their learning.
eff66458-9e78-4860-8882-1586f891c93a.name: SIG University - Faculty Member

badge_template_activities.title: This badge is designated to a sourcing, outsourcing or procurement thought leader that is known for motivating and developing the next generation of sourcing and procurement professionals.

Recipients of this badge have served as faculty for one of SIG University's certification programs or courses, monitoring and adding to discussion forum topics during the weeks that they serve as faculty.

9b74d976-25b0-45c8-8430-292fa48923f9.description: The SIG Advisory Board is comprised of sourcing, procurement and outsourcing thought leaders from some of the most innovative and globally-recognized companies in the world.
9b74d976-25b0-45c8-8430-292fa48923f9.name: SIG - Advisory Board

badge_template_activities.title: Board members serve a three-year term and provide advice and insight into the latest policies, procedures, member benefits and innovations which allow SIG to remain on the forefront of relevant topics.
The SIG Advisory Board is by invitation only from SIG Leadership and offered to SIG champions who have demonstrated a commitment to and deep knowledge of SIG.
Advisory Board members must be with a current SIG member company in good standing.  Click here to become a member of SIG.

d9b15b26-2e03-41c3-b476-a7236d75c05d.description: The SIG Resource Center (SRC) provides access to a robust set of professional templates, thought leadership, process matrices and methodologies from member companies. The SRC Thought Leaders Council (TLC) is a group of buy-side practitioners and the advisors, consultants and solution providers that support their endeavors. The TLC curates content for the SRC, works in groups to build content for leading edge topics like automation and conducts industry benchmarking.
d9b15b26-2e03-41c3-b476-a7236d75c05d.name: SIG - Resource Center Thought Leaders Council Member

badge_template_activities.title: An SRC TLC member is an executive level practitioner or experienced advisor, consultant or solution provider (reporting to a C-level executive) who has deep category management and organizational development experience, leads corporate-level initiatives and has intimate knowledge of current industry trends.
A Member contributes tools, templates and business cases for sourcing activities and spend categories, as well as content for presentations, whitepapers, webinars and benchmarking surveys.

502a2f46-500e-476d-9d30-b90bcd2dae3a.description: The Future of Sourcing Awards program recognizes organizations and individuals that show innovation, leadership and transformation in categories that are critical to the sourcing industry. Awards were given to celebrate companies in the following categories: Sourcing, Outsourcing, Third Party Management, Supplier Performance, Digitization, Governance/Compliance, Talent Management and Sustainability. Recipients of this badge were nominated and chosen as winners in one of these categories.
502a2f46-500e-476d-9d30-b90bcd2dae3a.name: Future of Sourcing Awards - Innovations in Governance/Compliance (2019) Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: The companies that win these awards represent the best example of innovation in each category, showing the greatest achievement in terms of fundamentally changing the nature of their business. Once chosen, finalists were interviewed in Future of Sourcing, a digital publication, delivered an “Awards Talk” at the fall SIG Summit and submitted a whitepaper to share the nuts and bolts of their nomination.
The winner of this award represented the best example of innovation in governance and compliance.

2ccd3a5e-21c7-4040-a384-fe220d7b7541.description: Future of Sourcing publishes the latest content for opinion-formers and decision-makers at the heart of the global sourcing community. Authors are thought leaders in the global sourcing community and provide innovative, cutting-edge insight on challenges and opportunities in the industry today. Originally launched as Outsource Magazine in 2005, the digital publication has been re-branded to reflect the innovations in the industry and celebrate those who are leading the change.
2ccd3a5e-21c7-4040-a384-fe220d7b7541.name: Future of Sourcing – Author

badge_template_activities.title: A Future of Sourcing author has deep knowledge of procurement, sourcing, supply chain and/or outsourcing trends, strategies and objectives. These individuals tend to be leaders and innovators in their fields. They are working to advance the industry, build knowledge networks and have been qualified to present their insights through a peer-review process.
If you are interested in becoming a Future of Sourcing contributor, please reach out to Hailey Corr at hcorr@futureofsourcing.com.
Interested in reading the latest article from this author? Click here.

7e50d620-667b-4a76-927b-99c3df7fb3ac.description: The Future of Sourcing Awards program recognizes organizations and individuals that show innovation, leadership and transformation in categories that are critical to the sourcing industry. Awards are given to celebrate companies in the following categories: Sourcing, Outsourcing, Third Party Management, Supplier Performance, Digitization, Governance/Compliance, Talent Management and Sustainability. Recipients of this badge were nominated and chosen as finalists in one of these categories.
7e50d620-667b-4a76-927b-99c3df7fb3ac.name: Future of Sourcing Awards - Finalist - 2022

badge_template_activities.title: The companies that are finalists in these awards represent the best example of innovation in each category, showing the greatest achievement in terms of fundamentally changing the nature of their business. Once chosen, finalists were interviewed in Future of Sourcing, a digital publication, delivered an “Awards Talk” at the fall SIG Summit and submitted a whitepaper to share the nuts and bolts of their nomination.

81b61bbf-d5c7-4be6-a5f0-ced35b3dd963.description: SIG University (SIG U) Advisory Board Members are forward thinking subject matter experts in strategic sourcing, outsourcing or procurement.  SIG U Board Members are leaders in their fields and  not only know sourcing and outsourcing, but they also practice these disciplines professionally.
81b61bbf-d5c7-4be6-a5f0-ced35b3dd963.name: SIG University - Advisory Board Member

badge_template_activities.title: This badge is designated to a thought leader who is known and highly respected throughout the sourcing and outsourcing industry.

Recipients of this badge were nominated and chosen as winners in one of these categories.
c591fe43-1554-471e-a807-c2fb63477018.name: Future of Sourcing Awards - Innovations in Supplier Performance Management (2019) Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: The companies that win these awards represent the best example of innovation in each category, showing the greatest achievement in terms of fundamentally changing the nature of their business. Once chosen, finalists were interviewed in Future of Sourcing, a digital publication, delivered an “Awards Talk” at the fall SIG Summit and submitted a whitepaper to share the nuts and bolts of their nomination.
The winner of this award represented the best example of innovation in supplier performance management.

cd156d3a-748f-41a2-8f66-55b71d98e40b.description: The Future of Sourcing Awards program recognizes organizations and individuals that show innovation, leadership and transformation in categories that are critical to the sourcing industry. Individual awards were presented in two individual categories and two special categories: Rising Star, Sourcing Star, Supernova Hall of Fame and the Lifetime Achievement Award. Recipients of this badge were nominated and chosen as winners in one of these categories.
cd156d3a-748f-41a2-8f66-55b71d98e40b.name: Future of Sourcing Awards - Supernova Hall of Fame (2018) Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Individual award nominations may have been submitted by a colleague or a business partner. Nominations were evaluated on merits, accomplishments, successes and other factors.  Once chosen, finalists were interviewed via podcast in late August,  delivered an “Award Talk” at the fall SIG Summit to share the nuts and bolts of their nomination, required to write a summary of the nomination, and requested to put together an overview collateral piece for distribution at the Summit.
This surprise award was given to industry titans who have contributed in such considerable ways that a new category had to be created.

6d06d06a-e2e7-48bc-9683-eb91c456c00c.description: The Future of Sourcing Awards program recognizes organizations and individuals that show innovation, leadership and transformation in categories that are critical to the sourcing industry. 1f7dfc94-a11e-4311-9987-1ece2cda63c6.description: Graduates of this course program have learned about the various technologies used in cognitive procurement and how they can be applied to different procurement processes. The course also covers best practices for implementing cognitive procurement, as well as strategies for overcoming common challenges. Through experiential demos and case studies, participants will gain a deeper understanding of how cognitive procurement can be used to improve their organization's procurement outcomes.
1f7dfc94-a11e-4311-9987-1ece2cda63c6.name: SIG University - Cognitive Procurement Specialization Program (CPSP)

85e9d152-e472-4c3c-bd47-473c74d952ef.description: Graduates of this program have learned the significance of collaborative and relational contracts in creating greater value, mitigating risk, and fostering innovation in today’s commercial contracts and strategic business relationships. This program helps individuals, organizations, and the supplier/customer enterprise put effective relationship management and governance programs in place by exposing students to leading-edge training in this multi-week program.
85e9d152-e472-4c3c-bd47-473c74d952ef.name: SIG University - Contracting in the New Economy (CITNE) Program

badge_template_activities.title: The badge earner has successfully completed all coursework and passed all quizzes in the program.

508af143-f863-46a8-b712-d92e89460d93.description: Upon completing this program, account executives will have strong skills to strategically position their organization for winning remunerative awards. The program provides executives with essential competencies, such as how to… gauge the buyer's intent to purchase, expertly position proposals for gate reviews, identify gaps, flaws, and hidden assumptions to mitigate risk effectively, make meaningful redlines to the buyer's pro forma contract, communicate value strategically, and more...
508af143-f863-46a8-b712-d92e89460d93.name: SIG University - RFx Response Mastery: The Art of Leveraging the Complex RFx to Win More Lucrative Deals, Faster and with Far Less Effort

badge_template_activities.title: The badge earner has successfully completed all coursework and passed all quizzes in the program.
